reviewText: If you love the show you must buy it. It's a great show and every season is good. I'm a big fan please keep releasing amazing race on dvd thanks bye...
Title: The Amazing Race, S12

reviewText: If you choose each episode individually from the menu it seems like footage is missing from the last episode of Disc 2 and the first episode of Disc 3 is in the wrong order. However, the seems that there was an technical error with the discs. If you access these episodes using the Play All option on the respective discs all the footage is present.
Title: The Amazing Race, S12

reviewText: We like the losers and some is great will be our good nice winnings and some of might be bad
Title: The Amazing Race, S12

reviewText: Have enjoyed re-watching all of the seasons without having to wait between episodes or seasons.  I know that I couldn't/wouldn't do all that they go through.
Title: The Amazing Race, S12

reviewText: Arrived on time and in new condition. I love this series as it allows me to tour the world while learning about local cultures and enjoying the competition without leaving my home. Season 12 was no exception. Looking forward to the next season released.
Title: The Amazing Race, S12

reviewText: I am a huge TAR fan and have purchased every season released so far. When I received the discs 2 days ago, my heart sank!There were huge scraps and scratches all over every single disc in addition to one episode with a huge chunk of airtime missing!Another one with sequences totally spliced out of place....very poor editing that is NOT from the original telecast.Shocking!!!
summary: Discs  with scratches and scraps every where
Title: The Amazing Race, S12
